game.title: Artifact Recovery
game.objective: Recover the ancient artifact from the Dragon's Lair
game.description: You are tasked to brave the treacherous Dragon's Lair and recover the ancient artifact that is said to hold ancient magic.
game.reward: 5000 gold pieces and a mystical amulet

task.description: Travel through the Dark Forest, across the desert of Zar, to the entrance of the Dragon's Lair.
Locate the treasure room amidst the labyrinth inside the Dragon's Lair and retrieve the ancient artifact.
